item.title: Flight Crew Seat Manual Adjustment System – (Armrest)

numlitem.para: Affected armrest is in up position or removed, and
Seat is acceptable to affected crewmember.

placard.para: Placard near upper EICAS "______ SEAT ARMREST INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: If applicable, secure inoperative armrest in up position or remove.
